site.description: JBoss Tools 3.2.0 Update Site / p2 Repo

category-def.name: SDKTools
category-def.label: JBoss Tools SDK
category-def.description: JBoss Tools SDK contains plugins where an SDK package exists. These contain both source and runtimes. Use these if you want to debug and/or provide patches to JBoss Tools plugins.

category-def.name: AllTools
category-def.label: All JBoss Tools 3.2.0
category-def.description: Contains ALL the plugins that are available from JBoss Tools except those related to integration with 3rd party plugins. Selecting this category will give you all tools needed for both Web, Seam and SOA Development.

category-def.name: SOATools
category-def.label: SOA Development
category-def.description: Tools to help create SOA applications. Use these if you work with jBPM, Drools, JBoss ESB, JBoss WebServices or Smooks.

category-def.name: WebTools
category-def.label: Web and Java EE Development

category-def.name: DataTools
category-def.label: Data Services
category-def.description: Tools related to data services such as persistence and transformation.

category-def.name: MavenTools
category-def.label: Maven Support
category-def.description: Plugins related to Maven and m2eclipse support. Use these to enable use of Maven.

category-def.name: ReportTools
category-def.label: Business Intelligence, Reporting and Charting
category-def.description: Business Intelligence, Reporting and Charting. Use these if you plan to integrate Hibernate or Seam with Eclipse BIRT.

category-def.name: TestPerfTools
category-def.label: Test and Performance
category-def.description: Tools used to improve testing and performance.
